case_title: United States of America v. Noble
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Noble

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(C) Distribution of fentanyl and heroin(1s-7s)

charges.charge_disposition: Custody of BOP for 240 months on each of counts 1s-7s, to run concurrently. The Court recommends: That the defendant be placed in a facility as close to Elyria, OH as possible that offers a drug treatment program; That the defendant participate in any drug treatment programs offered at the designated facility. Defendant remanded to the custody of the US Marshal. Supervised Release for a term of 3 years on each count, to run concurrently, with conditions: Mandatory Drug Testing; Firearms and Dangerous Weapons Prohibited; DNA Collection; Substance Abuse Treatment and Testing; Mental Health Treatment; Search and Seizure; Cognitive Behavioral Program. Fine waived. Restitution not ordered. Special Assessment $700.00.
